summary_gpt: InterGlobe Aviation Limited announced the appointment of Mr. Michael G. Whitaker as an Independent Director for a five-year term, pending shareholder approval, and noted the completion of Dr. V. Sumantran's tenure as an Independent Director, who will cease to be on the board from May 28, 2025. The company also expressed appreciation for Dr. Sumantran's contributions during his tenure.

InterGlobe Aviation Limited announced the appointment of Mr. Michael G. Whitaker as an Independent Director for a five-year term, subject to shareholder approval, and noted the completion of Dr. V. Sumantran's tenure as an Independent Director, who will cease to be on the board from May 28, 2025. The company also expressed appreciation for Dr. Sumantran's contributions during his tenure.
